# Euro yield curves
## get data
download data from [Eurostat](https://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/databrowser/view/irt_euryld_m/default/table?lang=en)
```{r getdata}
yield_curve <- get_eurostat(id="irt_euryld_m")
glimpse(yield_curve)
skim(yield_curve)
```
